title: The scheme, when undertaken by a Co-operative Housing Society of slum dwellers, may provide an addit
clause_text: The scheme, when undertaken by a Co-operative Housing Society of slum dwellers, may provide an additional 5 percent built-up area on the rehabilitation area free of cost
section: Commercial / Office / Shop / Economic Activity Free of Cost
